channel.title: Project Storm 718(Are you ready for this?!)
channel.description:
[center][b]Features[/b]
- AutoDonation System - Prestige system! - Player shops! - You can edit your gravestone + bless, and demolish it. - A New changing appearance system, no more makeup mage! Woot. - Dungeoneering has been added. (Still being worked on and fully added BUT we made it 100% function-able until we're finished) - Spirit Three has been added. - Runespan has been added. - Livid Farming, along with fully working Farming(You can train Farming at every Farming Place) - Added a better donator zone with shops and pets that GROW. - Fixed Shops. - Fixed Prices. - Added Squeal of Fortune - Fixed the crashing/dc and all lag issues! Also upgraded to a very good VPS. - All special attacks. - All capes obtainable. - PvP Points + Shop - AutoCasting - Set Your Own Yell Color. - Custom quests are being setup now! - Minigames - All Spellbooks. - Regular updates! - Multi Barrages - Working Summoning - Flawless Pking & Combat - Working Korasi’s Sword - Working curses prayer book, including turmoil! - All Spirit shields(Creating & Effects). - Staff of light Special - XP Counter. - View Stats (Right Click Option). - Stable Xp Rate, with DXP weekend every 2 weeks. - Chat & IPLogs. - Premium server control panel made from scratch - Automatic Server Messages. - Bank Tabs. - ItemBonuses. - Fight Pits. - Music Tab. - Godwars fully added - Item Creations. (New armors, weaponry, animations, spells. Not stupid ones this is like RS releasing new items) - All Items added - Experience Lamps. - Adding Bonus XP stars to SoF - Dominion Items, and tower - Glacors. - Replaced the System Tab. - Barrows with coffins. - Drop Editor + Packer. - Fixed most of the NPC Nulls. - New Commands. - Switching. - Lodestones. - Full Fight Caves. - Full Kiln. - The correct emotes + configurations. - Money Pouch - Starter Kit. - Repair Stand. - Correct Item requirements. - Every tree is cutable - Agility. - XP diffaculties - King Black Dragon. - Firemaking with correct anims. - Birds nest. - All Logs can be fletched + Interfaces. - Bones On Altar + Burying. - Abyss. - Smithing - Living Rock Caverns. - Dicing - Flower Games can be played - Slayer + Reward Shop. - You will receive damage from the stalls to block auto clicking afkers. - All skills cap at 120, giving players WAY more to go for, and a reason to fill XP. - Custom beginning dialogue. - Crucible - Castlewars - Zombie Onslaught - Clanwars - Bank Pins [u][b]And there's more..[/u]
Bosses:[/b]
- Lucien - Glacors. - Jadinko Lair. - Ganodermic. - Strykewyrms. - Dagonnoth's. - Godwars - KBD - Corp Beast - GrotWrom lair (QBD)
[u][b]And more..[/b][/u]
[b][Skills & Information][/b]
[b]Dungeoneering System;[/b]
We have a different Dungeoneering. We've made it so it's fully function-able even though it's not 100% complete. We have a solo dung, and team dung. There's 3 floors 3 bosses. You gain tokens per npc and dungeon you complete, aswell as xp. It's a pretty simple system we've added while we setup and add in, a way more complex dung system, where there's 110 floors, a prestige system, and complexity setting.
[b]Slayer:[/b]
We've added all slayer dungeons, and even added a donators dungeon which has exclusive new monsters and loots. We've added godwars tasks and bosses tasks to the slayer system, such as godwars bosses, added a daggonoth dungeon, polypore dung, glacors, grotworms, revenant, Jadinko, and much more.
[b]Runespan works great, and has plenty different options![/b]
- Slayer.. - Summoning.. - Alching.. - Squeal Of Fortune.. - BonesOnAltar - Flawless Pking! - Pvm.. - & More
[b]We have a unique pet system:[/b]
We have all pets you could imagine obtaining, plus we're working on new ones! And a very special one. One that's never been seen in RS, or in any RSPS...
It's a mini you! :D
It'll have unique things unlike any other pet.
We have tons of content coming every day! Including a NEW SKILL. So stay tuned, and enjoy the game! Hope you enjoy! Sorry for no pictures, login to see. Links under video
[youtube]<iframe width="854" height="510" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/he8C4la-00M" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>[/youtube]
[b]Website:[/b] http://projectstorm.org/ (Down currently, to server maintenance will be up soon.)
[b]Forum:[/b] http://projectstorm.org/forum/ (Down currently, to server maintenance will be up soon.)
[b]Client DL:[/b] http://uppit.com/m9sk1kqj9cdd/Project-Storm.jar Will upload to mediafire later CBA right now[/center]

item.title: Project Storm 718(Are you ready for this?!)
item.dc:creator: @Planet_X Planet X
item.description:
@Planet_X wrote:

Soulcist:

You forgot to add the links and where’s the media?

OOOOOOOOOh -facepalm- i’m so sorry. I can’t get the media right now, login to see it
I’ll edit the post and add the links, i’ll add pictures later.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Storm 718(Are you ready for this?!)
item.dc:creator: @Planet_X Planet X
item.description:
@Planet_X wrote:

[center]Features

  • AutoDonation System
  • Prestige system!
  • Player shops!
  • You can edit your gravestone + bless, and demolish it.
  • A New changing appearance system, no more makeup mage! Woot.
  • Dungeoneering has been added. (Still being worked on and fully added BUT we made it 100% function-able until we’re finished)
  • Spirit Three has been added.
  • Runespan has been added.
  • Livid Farming, along with fully working Farming(You can train Farming at every Farming Place)
  • Added a better donator zone with shops and pets that GROW.
  • Fixed Shops.
  • Fixed Prices.
  • Added Squeal of Fortune
  • Fixed the crashing/dc and all lag issues! Also upgraded to a very good VPS.
  • All special attacks.
  • All capes obtainable.
  • PvP Points + Shop
  • AutoCasting
  • Set Your Own Yell Color.
  • Custom quests are being setup now!
  • Minigames
  • All Spellbooks.
  • Regular updates!
  • Multi Barrages
  • Working Summoning
  • Flawless Pking & Combat
  • Working Korasi’s Sword
  • Working curses prayer book, including turmoil!
  • All Spirit shields(Creating & Effects).
  • Staff of light Special
  • XP Counter.
  • View Stats (Right Click Option).
  • Stable Xp Rate, with DXP weekend every 2 weeks.
  • Chat & IPLogs.
  • Premium server control panel made from scratch
  • Automatic Server Messages.
  • Bank Tabs.
  • ItemBonuses.
  • Fight Pits.
  • Music Tab.
  • Godwars fully added
  • Item Creations. (New armors, weaponry, animations, spells. Not stupid ones this is like RS releasing new items)
  • All Items added
  • Experience Lamps.
  • Adding Bonus XP stars to SoF
  • Dominion Items, and tower
  • Glacors.
  • Replaced the System Tab.
  • Barrows with coffins.
  • Drop Editor + Packer.
  • Fixed most of the NPC Nulls.
  • New Commands.
  • Switching.
  • Lodestones.
  • Full Fight Caves.
  • Full Kiln.
  • The correct emotes + configurations.
  • Money Pouch
  • Starter Kit.
  • Repair Stand.
  • Correct Item requirements.
  • Every tree is cutable
  • Agility.
  • XP diffaculties
  • King Black Dragon.
  • Firemaking with correct anims.
  • Birds nest.
  • All Logs can be fletched + Interfaces.
  • Bones On Altar + Burying.
  • Abyss.
  • Smithing
  • Living Rock Caverns.
  • Dicing
  • Flower Games can be played
  • Slayer + Reward Shop.
  • You will receive damage from the stalls to block auto clicking afkers.
  • All skills cap at 120, giving players WAY more to go for, and a reason to fill XP.
  • Custom beginning dialogue.
  • Crucible
  • Castlewars
  • Zombie Onslaught
  • Clanwars
  • Bank Pins
    [b]And there’s more…

Bosses:[/b]

  • Lucien
  • Glacors.
  • Jadinko Lair.
  • Ganodermic.
  • Strykewyrms.
  • Dagonnoth’s.
  • Godwars
  • KBD
  • Corp Beast
  • GrotWrom lair (QBD)

And more…

[Skills & Information]

Dungeoneering System;

We have a different Dungeoneering. We’ve made it so it’s fully function-able even though it’s not 100% complete.
We have a solo dung, and team dung. There’s 3 floors 3 bosses. You gain tokens per npc and dungeon you complete, aswell as xp.
It’s a pretty simple system we’ve added while we setup and add in, a way more complex dung system, where there’s 110 floors, a prestige system, and complexity setting.

Slayer:

We’ve added all slayer dungeons, and even added a donators dungeon which has exclusive new monsters and loots.
We’ve added godwars tasks and bosses tasks to the slayer system, such as godwars bosses, added a daggonoth dungeon, polypore dung, glacors, grotworms, revenant, Jadinko, and much more.

Runespan works great, and has plenty different options!

  • Slayer…
  • Summoning…
  • Alching…
  • Squeal Of Fortune…
  • BonesOnAltar
  • Flawless Pking!
  • Pvm…
  • & More

We have a unique pet system:

We have all pets you could imagine obtaining, plus we’re working on new ones!
And a very special one. One that’s never been seen in RS, or in any RSPS…

It’s a mini you!

It’ll have unique things unlike any other pet.

We have tons of content coming every day! Including a NEW SKILL. So stay tuned, and enjoy the game!
Hope you enjoy! Sorry for no pictures, login to see. Links under video

[youtube][/youtube]

Website: http://projectstorm.org/ (Down currently, to server maintenance will be up soon.)

Forum: http://projectstorm.org/forum/ (Down currently, to server maintenance will be up soon.)

Client DL: http://uppit.com/m9sk1kqj9cdd/Project-Storm.jar
Will upload to mediafire later CBA right now[/center]
